Weapon.Name: Whispering Blade
Weapon.Description: A slender sword that seems to hum with a strange energy when swung. Crafted from the lost metal of Azurinth.
Weapon.WeaponCapabilities: Chance to silence enemy spellcasters for 5 seconds
Weapon.NarrativeLine: As the blade cuts through the air, a silent hush falls over the enemy’s arcane whispers.

Weapon.Name: Ember Staff
Weapon.Description: An ancient staff, smoldering with a contained inferno, once wielded by the pyromancer Eldrit.
Weapon.WeaponCapabilities: Ignites the target for additional fire damage over 10 seconds
Weapon.NarrativeLine: Flames wrap around the foe, burning essence and flesh alike.

Weapon.Name: Bonecrusher Mace
Weapon.Description: A hefty mace made from the skull of the dread beast Gormar. Its hits echo the beast’s roars.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: With every hit, the sound of Gormar's roar fills the air, stunning those who hear it.
